abstract: Growth of Netflix into global streaming video service has been largely funded by company's DVD-by-Mail operation, which continues to make hundreds of millions of dollars in profit despite dwindling sales; company has streamlined its DVD operation and continues to improve customer service, focusing on efficiency and automation.
lead_paragraph: Instead of ignoring its DVD-by-mail operation that was dwindling but still bringing in hundreds of millions of dollars in profits every year, the company concentrated on efficiency.

headline.main: Netflix Refines Its DVD Business, Even as Streaming Unit Booms
headline.print_headline: The Disc Isn’t Dead, Just More Efficient

snippet: Instead of ignoring its DVD-by-mail operation that was dwindling but still bringing in hundreds of millions of dollars in profits every year, the company concentrated on efficiency.
